meanings.definition: Failing to take care of or pay attention to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The neglectful parent forgot to pick up their child from school.
meanings.sent2: She was neglectful in watering her plants, so they withered away.
meanings.sent3: The neglectful student left their homework at home and had to improvise in class.
meanings.sent4: The neglectful driver ignored the warning signs and ended up lost in the middle of nowhere.
meanings.sent5: The neglectful pet owner left their dog outside in the rain without shelter.

meanings.sent1: The neglectful behavior of the manager led to many mistakes in the project.
meanings.sent2: The neglectful attitude of the employee caused frustration among the team.
meanings.sent3: The neglectful chef forgot to add a key ingredient to the recipe, resulting in a bland dish.
meanings.sent4: The neglectful maintenance of the building led to its gradual deterioration over time.
meanings.sent5: The neglectful handling of sensitive information exposed the company to security risks.
